name: Solmec: Among Stars
description: Solmec: Among Stars is a resource management game which allows you to play as the Ankazil, giant space roaming beasts. Infected by the Rot, you must travel across the different solar systems to find your way home. However, the Rot has spread across the galaxy making once peaceful environmentâ€™s infested with hostile enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsXP or Higher Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 166 MB available space
